meanings.definition: Relating to or stimulating the gonads.
meanings.sent1: The gonadotrophic treatment helped improve the reproductive health of the patient.

meanings.definition: A hormone that stimulates the gonads.
meanings.sent1: The body produces gonadotrophic to regulate reproductive functions.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the role of gonadotrophic in fertility treatments.
meanings.sent3: The gonadotrophic in the body seemed to have a mind of its own, working tirelessly.
